description: STEP 3 BRIDGE tool. Searches for 'bridge papers' in other domains using the gap's contact concept. Searches all domains except the source_domain for papers related to bridge_concept. The agent applies the Self-Correction Protocol to discard candidates with 'keyword-only matches lacking mechanistic relevance' and re-searches.

configuration.query: FROM ti-papers METADATA _score | WHERE MATCH(content, ?bridge_concept) AND domain != ?source_domain | SORT _score DESC | LIMIT 10 | KEEP arxiv_id, title, abstract, domain, primary_category, categories, _score, published

bridge_concept.description: Gap contact concept. The core mechanism or methodology extracted from ti-detect results. Example: 'optogenetic stimulation neural circuit modulation'

source_domain.description: Domain where the original gap was found. This domain will be excluded from the search
